services.title: Cake
services.description: Cakes are often made to celebrate special occasions like birthdays or weddings.

services.title: Kaju Katli
services.description: Kaju katli literally 'cashew slice', also known as kaju barfi, is an Indian dessert similar to a barfi.

services.title: Gulab Jamun
services.description: Gulab jamun is an Indian dessert of fried dough balls that are soaked in a sweet, sticky sugar syrup.
